summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Municipal Light and Power System, providing for the acquisition of certain property and property rights in Wenzel Addition and the Southwest 1/4 of the Northeast 1/4 of Section 31, township 26 North, Range 4 East, W.M., for expansion of the North Service Center as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing system, and making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor.
